data.title: Know the Relationship Status of English Film Writer, Ol Parkerand His Net Worth
data.meta_description: Ol Parker is a famous English Film Writer and a director. He is best known forImagine Me & You(2005) andNow Is Good(2012). He wrote and directed the 2018 musical filmMamma Mia! Here We Go Again.
data.text:
Ol Parker is a famous English Film Writer and a director. He is best known for Imagine Me & You (2005) and Now Is Good (2012). He wrote and directed the 2018 musical film Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again.

Ol Parker was born as Oliver Parker on June 2, 1969, in London England. Ol did not come from an affluent family so, much information about his early life, and his parent's information is not known to the public. Ol is very much private about his lifestyle. He started his career in the mid-1990s.

Relationship Status of Ol Parker

Ol Paker was into limelight from his career job. To add much to that, He married his long time girlfriend, Thandie Newton. The love birds exchanged their wedding vows in 1998. They had been dating for sometime before tying their knots.

Much about their first meeting instance is not shared with the public. The duo had a private wedding ceremony. Only a few members from both the family and some close friends attended the ceremony.

Thandie is a famous English actress who is best known for Mission: Impossible, Crash, and a few more. She is vegan and was named PETA's "Sexiest Vegan of 2014" in the UK.

Ol Parker is the Father of Three Children

Ol Parker is the proud father of three children. Ol welcomed his first child a daughter, Ripley in 2000. Then in 2004, They had their second child, a daughter, Nico. The family of four was living a happy life.

In 2013, The love birds were blessed with a son, Booker Jomber. His wife had home births with all three of her children. The family of five is very much close to each other. They have been living a happy life through their social media.

Net Worth and Earnings

Ol Parker has a net worth of more than $2 Million. Ol has accumulated most of his net worth through his successful career of working as a English film writer and director. Peter Morgan is a famous British Film Writer with a net worth of $10 Million.

Ol Parker earned some of his first writing credits in 1994 on the long-running comedy series Grange Hill. He both wrote and produced the 2000 comedy It Was an Accident. He wrote and directed the 2005 film Imagine Me & You starring Piper Perabo and Lena Headey. The writer also penned the popular 2012 film Now is Good

Parker Wife- Millions In Net Worth

Ol's wife, Thandie Newton has a net worth of more than $12 Million. She credits most of her net worth to her successful career of working as a actress. Thandie had been working in Hollywood for more than two decades.

She was ranked one of the best dressed women in 2018 by fashion website Net-a-Porter and later that year it was announced that Newton was included in the 2019 edition of the Powerlist, ranking the 100 most influential Black Britons.

For more information regarding different celebrities' affairs and relationship, please visit MarriedCeleb.
